page.title: 18LIVESTOCK/PETS IN CLATFORD
page.content: Having done a study of the {PETS }kept by children of Clatford School we discovered that out of 158 children 84% keep pets.Of these pets fish are the most common followed by chicken and cats.Only two children keep unusual pets,these are watersnakes and ferrets.Children are encouraged to take care of their pets themselves but often it falls to the parents to undertake to look after them.Clatford School's pets are fish which Class 1 keep.Two older children clean them out weekly.The fish are fed daily by children in Class 1. We did a study of {FARMING}in our area.Cowdown farmhouse keeps Pedigree Guernsey {COWS},50 in milk and the rest are in various stages of development...calves,heifers and bulls used for breeding.Westover farm keeps no {LIVESTOCK}at all.
